definition: everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This problem, there is extensive catholicity in social life.
sentences.chinese: 这个新问题，在社会生活中有广泛的普遍性。

sentences.english: How do you resolve the tension between local specificity and theoretical generalizability?
sentences.chinese: 您如何处理地方特殊性与理论普遍性之间的张力？
结果可能不具有普遍性。

sentences.english: It has always been the universal phenomenon to against the Southeast Asia Ethnic Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 反华排华一直是东南亚的普遍性现象。

sentences.english: The poet metamorphoses the everyday into the universal.
sentences.chinese: 诗人把日常的事变为普遍性的事。

sentences.english: Secondly, the relationship between universality and specificity.
sentences.chinese: 第二，普遍性与特殊性的关系。

sentences.english: The universality that man presents in his relation with nature and that in his socia…
sentences.chinese: 人的普遍性同科学技术的发展密不可分。

sentences.english: Also, the subjects ought to be universal, and the criminal burden ought to be strengthened.
sentences.chinese: 同时，劳动权司法保护的主体应当具有普遍性。

sentences.english: The difficulty in financing has become the universal problem restricting the development of SMEs.
sentences.chinese: 融资难己经成为制约我国中小企业发展的普遍性问题。

sentences.english: Christ is the basis of our Universalism.
sentences.chinese: 基督是我们的普遍性的基础。

sentences.english: Aesthetic education can influence man because of its universality and unconventionality .
sentences.chinese: 美育对人能发生作用在于关具有普遍性和超脱性。

sentences.english: The contents of legal education should be an unification of catholicity and pertinence.
sentences.chinese: 法学教育的内容应是普遍性与针对性的统一。

sentences.english: Arrearage of progress of economy of field of state-operated stud stock is a problem that has catholicity.
sentences.chinese: 国营种畜场经济发展迟滞是一个具有普遍性的问题。

sentences.english: Fifthly, further efforts should be made to promote universality and national implementation measures.
sentences.chinese: 第五，加强公约普遍性和国家履约措施。

sentences.english: But a broader and more generous, certainly more philosophical, view is held by those scientists who claim .
sentences.chinese: 有些科学家的观点更开阔，更富有普遍性和哲理性。

sentences.english: The CWC has become one of the most universal treaties on international arms control and non-proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 公约已成为最具普遍性的国际军控与防扩散条约之一。
